headline: Affirm Boosts Growth With $500M PGIM Deal & New Merchant Partnerships
summary: AFRM's loans worth $500 million are privately purchased by PGIM Fixed Income, boosting AFRM's working capital.

headline: Prudential Financial: The Buying Window Has Closed (For Now)
summary: Since my last article, Prudential Financial shares have moderately outperformed the S&P 500 index. Read why I downgrade PRU stock from buy to hold.
